resources.string: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma beae ho kwan ma ɛyɛ adwuma
Ɛsɛ sɛ wogye beaeɛ ho kwan na Securitly atumi ayɛ adwuma
Hi, me ne Emma, \u200b\u200bme battery wui.
Ɛsɛ sɛ Securitly hu beae a wowɔ bere nyinaa

So wopɛ sɛ woma beae a wowɔ no tumi yɛ adwuma?
Kɔ Settings -> Apps -> Securitly -> Bere nyinaa ma beae ho kwan.

Afei san hyɛ Securitly ase
Fa me beae a etwa to no mena
Send ntɛmpɛ nkra bere a battery level yɛ
San hyehyɛ data a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ no
Wogye di sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosan hyehyɛ default data?
Battery ɔha biara mu nkyem a ɛba fam koraa yɛ 2% .
Battery ɔha biara mu nkyem a ɛsen biara yɛ 100% .
Yɛsrɛ sɛ fa nɔma bi kyerɛ
Wopɛ sɛ wopopa saa nkitahodi yi fi wo nkitahodifo din mu?
Yɛsrɛ wo hyɛ "Edin" afã no ma
Yɛsrɛ sɛ hyɛ "Telefon nɔma" afã no ma
1. Ɛsɛ sɛ Securitly hu beae a wowɔ bere nyinaa. Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛyɛ saa no, kɔ wo device nhyehyɛe -> apps -> Securitly -> Permissions na sesa beae ho kwan no kɔ "Ma kwan bere nyinaa".
2.Nhyɛ sɛ wobɛto Securitly. Sɛ ɛnte saa a, wɔremfa wo nkrasɛm a egye ntɛmpɛ no nkɔma wɔn a wo ne wɔn di nkitaho no.
3. Yɛnhyɛ nyansa sɛ fa battery level a wode wo ntɛmpɛ nkrasɛm bɛmena no to 1 anaa 2%, efisɛ ebia wo mfiri no bedum ansa na wode nkra no amena.

Sukuufo 5 a wofi Mfiridwuma Asoɛe a ɛwɔ Laguna, Mexico na wɔyɛɛ saa app yi. Saa adwuma yi fii ase sɛ adwene a yɛde sii yɛn ani so sɛ yɛbɛma ayɛ nokware, na yɛne yɛn ɔfotufo, mfiridwumayɛfo Gerardo boom maa ɛyɛɛ yiye. Yɛwɔ anidaso sɛ yɛde saa app yi bɛboa kakra wɔ mprempren tebea a ɛwɔ wiase no mu.

Beae a etwa to a na me mfiri no wɔ ne:
latitude: 1000.
40.776570 na ɛwɔ hɔ
ne tenten: -73.969979
Central Park West Abakɔsɛm Mantam
New York, 10024, E. E., ne nea ɔkyerɛwee. UU.
Securitly ntumi nyɛ adwuma efisɛ wɔamma "Send SMS" kwan
Securitly ntumi nyɛ adwuma efisɛ wɔamma "Always Location" kwan. Ɛsɛ sɛ Securitly hu baabi a wowɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ebetumi de wo beae a etwa to a wunim no akɔma wɔn a woapaw wɔn no
Beae a etwa to a midii ne:
Mfomso bi bae wɔ saa afiri yi beae a wɔayɛ mu nhwehwɛmu no mu
Mma nkyerɛ "beae a wɔhwehwɛ" pop up bere a Securitly afi ase
